intro: Bletilla striata, commonly known as the Chinese ground orchid, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to East Asia. It features a rhizomatous root system and produces striking, showy flowers in shades of pink, white, and purple. The plant typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm and blooms in late spring to early summer. Its leaves are strap-shaped and evergreen, contributing to its ornamental value in gardens. Bletilla striata is valued for its medicinal properties and is often used in traditional Chinese medicine.
